meanings.definition: Expressing location or position in a particular place.
meanings.sent1: The cat sat at the sunny window.
meanings.sent2: The book is at the top of the shelf.
meanings.sent3: The flowers look happy at the garden.
meanings.sent4: The stars shine brightly at night.
meanings.sent5: The cozy blanket is at the end of the bed.

meanings.sent3: The alarm clock rings loudly at morning.

meanings.sent1: The apples are priced at $1 each.
meanings.sent2: The car drives at 60 miles per hour.
meanings.sent3: The ice cream melts quickly at the hot sun.
meanings.sent4: The birds chirp at a high pitch.
meanings.sent5: The clock ticks at a steady pace.

meanings.definition: Expressing a particular condition or state.
meanings.sent1: The water is at a boiling temperature.
meanings.sent2: The room is at a comfortable temperature.
meanings.sent3: The cat is at a playful mood.
meanings.sent4: The flowers are at full bloom.
meanings.sent5: The cake is at a delicious taste.
